name: Shib Generating
description: Shib Generating - SHG is a Token Gamer, from the BNB Chain Network, with a robust ecosystem, encompassing: 1- Swap shggear.com/swap 2- Farm Governance Token "SGear" 3- Stake shggear.com/stake 4- Automated burning portal 5- NFT Marketplace 6- Game launch pad a) SHG Race - Car Racha b)... c)... d)... e)... More games from the "SHG" lineup to be announced. The burning portal, on Twitter, @burn_shg automatically alerts the burns captured at https://bscscan.com/token/0x33af7644b1f60c8e8d62689b19d60a5d132164fc#balances with a, GIGANTIC, goal of eliminating 4 zeros. The Game Launching Platform "SHG Games" comes with a proposal of several games to reach all types of users, even the most demanding, with innovative graphics and a P2E and PvP footprint. The NFT Marketplace is SHG's exclusive store where users will buy and trade their NFTs from the various Games launched by the Launch Pad. With SHG Swap, the user makes any purchase or sale transaction of crypto assets without having to leave the SHG ecosystem, all in a simpler, practical, secure and faster way. SGear is the Governance Token of the Stake Platform, it offers Holders access to the various services attached to the Platform. The SHG Stake Platform has two purposes: one to guarantee, to Holders, gains in various tokens, while waiting for the appreciation of the assets. The other function is to burn the supply, constantly, from SGear and SHG.
